definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Owing to his fantastic performance, Ronaldo got the call-up to the full Brazil national squad.
sentences.chinese: 由于罗纳尔多的出色表现，他被选入巴西国家足球对。

sentences.english: Because he was tall and hale, he was chosen to join the School Guard Team.
sentences.chinese: 他因身体高大健壮，被学校选入了护校队。

sentences.english: So there is like a big controversy about having him  as the Bachelor again.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他再次被选入单身男士，备受争议。

sentences.english: Emmanuel Ebouehas been named in Ivory Coast's provisional 30-man squad.
sentences.chinese: 埃布埃被选入科特迪瓦队的30人名单。

sentences.english: Papers may be selected for inclusion in the class archive of student papers on the Web.
sentences.chinese: 论文可选入班级学生论文档案的网页。

sentences.english: The opt-in form should contain name and email field for the visitors to enter.
sentences.chinese: 选入的形式应包括为游人进入的姓名和电子邮件领域。

sentences.english: Retrieves the device context into which the current bitmap is selected.
sentences.chinese: 得到选入当前位图的设备描述表。

sentences.english: I'm looking to buy one or both of these for Jubak's Picks in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 我的投资精选在2010年会选入一只或是两只都买。

sentences.english: The average number of caps is almost 40.
sentences.chinese: 球员平均被选入国家队次数接近40次。

sentences.english: So he was not chosen for South Africa's Olympic team.
sentences.chinese: 所以他没有被选入南非队。

sentences.english: She is also the first Special Olympics athlete elected to the Special Olympics International board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 她还是第一位被选入特奥会世界理事会的特奥选手。

definition: to be chosen/to be elected as
to include (in a list etc)/to assign (to a class, a work unit etc)
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
to fail to be chosen (or elected)/to lose an election
to choose/to pick/to settle upon/to decide upon a candidate/to be selected for some role
to elect as/to choose as/to consider as
to engulf/to bury/to overlook/to stifle/to neglect/to fall into oblivion
to break the rule/to make an exception
compiled and published by Imperial command (old)
